## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an [x] -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style (ruff format)
- [ ] I have run `uv run ruff check .` and fixed all issues
- [ ] I have run `uv run pyright` and resolved all type errors
- [ ] I have added type hints to all new functions and methods

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] Test coverage remains at or above 95%

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings for new/modified functions
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)

### Commit Hygiene

- [ ] My commits follow conventional commit format
- [ ] I have rebased on the latest main branch
- [ ] I have squashed fixup commits
